view on bēhance

an involuntary quivering movement. also known as an expression of an unbecoming. this conceptual photography is a project from the one academy featuring double exposure and strong vibrant colors depicting a condition such as dysthymia, cylothymic, hypomania, and psychosis.

model — mateus aldi lawono
